Perioperative procedures and techniques (including anesthesia and surgery) were standardized per institution protocol and have been reported previously by Andropoulos et al.
17 . Briefly, the patient was anesthetized using isoflurane, fentanyl and midazolam. All patients received one dose of IV methylprednisolone (30Â mg/kg/dose) on induction of anesthesia. None of the patients received additional blood transfusion before obtaining second sample after surgery.
